titles.title: To authorize the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Kyrgyzstan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/22/1998--Introduced. Authorizes the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Kyrgyzstan.
